channel.title: 508 Help
channel.description:
New to 508's here's some questions: 1. how do you make yourself owner/admin/mod 2. Compiler error, ive tried on this for awhile...
Code of Compiler [code]@echo off title Building - OS VISTA cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]
I also tried this code: [code]@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]
I have Version 6 update 15 (build.1.6.0_15-bo3)
Thanks -Sexy slay

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Just change youre rights to 3 in your character file. And before you do that you need to be logged OUT.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

This compiler it perfect, so if it doesn’t work then you don’t got JDK.

Replace the your compiler code with this:

@echo off
cd ..
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

well im confused how the compiler, i found out the other part.
I know its been while and my environmental variables are prob screwed you know how to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

  1. Not sure how the default 500+ base is laid out, but there’s probably an admin configuration file that you just add your name to.
  2. What’s the error? Can’t do much with just your compiler script.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

New to 508’s here’s some questions:

  1. how do you make yourself owner/admin/mod
  2. Compiler error, ive tried on this for awhile…

Code of Compiler

@echo off title Building - OS VISTA cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

I also tried this code:

@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
